gigs.name: We Are Funny Project
gigs.blurb: Stretch your brain, open your mind and laugh. Or think. Maybe Both. We Are Funny Project runs free comedy nights every Monday and Tuesdays at Farrs in Dalston. Most weekends we run a one day workshop on some aspect of performance and comedy... from “MCing” to “Improv Fun and Games”, “Comedy Storytelling” to “Writing A Sit-Com” and a whole load more.

gigs.name: Comedy Virgins!
gigs.blurb: It's the Comedy Virgins show featuring newish acts doing 5 min sets and the crowd voting for the best in the Infamous clap-off. Hosts keep it rolling with free drinks for their favourite audience members!

gigs.name: Angel Comedy
gigs.blurb: Angel Comedy has grown from a once a week gig into a seven nights a week “Comedy Institution” (according to Timeout). And we've opened our own permanent venue, the Bill Murray. We're in Islington, London, England. We have free and funny shows every single night. We support new talent and big name acts. We believe in making comedy more accessible for audiences and comedians.

gigs.name: The Comedy Car Crash
gigs.blurb: The Lion's Den Comedy Car Crash is a spontaneous Open Mic Comedy night. None of the acts (Except 10 minute Headliners & groups) are booked in advance and the line-up is chosen from names drawn at random from a hat at the end of each act. We've been dubbed many times as the Biggest and Best Open Mic Night in Central London and we'd love you to come along so you can see why! Anyone can participate on the night as long as there are places left. Registration starts at 6.30pm.
